page.title: 14FARMING
page.content: {FISHING IN BETTYHILL } Fishing is very important locally for lots of reasons and can be divided up into various categories. These are: {COMMERCIAL SEA FISHING} There are four people who own fairly large boats and who add to their income by commercial fishing. Their catch is entirely lobsters which are kept in live boxes in the sea until there's enough to justify collection by a fish merchant. There are plenty of crabs to be caught but no market for them. The large stocks of white fish, herring and mackerel offshore are fished by large boats from the rest of Scotland and even England but not by local boats. This is partly because there are no decent harbours along the coast and the size of local boats is restricted.
